Author: HansBooby

Comment: I’ve dramatically curbed my spending since the new year. Chaos in the markets means my job is at risk. The market drops 5/10/15%, Wall Street has a model for how many jobs to cut.   I hope I don’t lose my job but I need to save to increase my emergency fund, it’s a brutal job market and it’s not going to get better under Trump.  What if my spouse and I BOTH lose our jobs? Never seen conditions where that could happen (even in 2008 and COVID!) but it sure seems possible now.
